repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
The second part of a multi-volume manuscript of the Tirukkuṟaḷ, with the commentary by Parimēlaḻakar, in 3 parts:
part 1 (Aṟattuppāl) = BnF Indien 48.
part 2 (Poruṭpāl) = BnF Indien 49.
part 3 (Kāmattuppāl) = BnF Indien 50.
Description by Eva Wilden based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Original manuscript examined by Emmanuel Francis (October 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

msItem.title: Tirukkuṟaḷ: Table of Contents of part 1 (Aṟattuppāl) = BnF Indien 48

collation.desc: 1 bifolio = Title Page (additional). Verso blank. 395 x 30 mm.
1 folio = guard leaf. Blank recto verso. 380 x 30 mm. Recto darker = original outside page.

169 folios = Tirukkuṟaḷ: Text & Parimēlaḻakar's Commentary. Tamil foliation 91 -120, 1211, 122, 1212, 122-239, 240-260. 395 x 30 mm. f114-f122 (390 x 30 mm) are by another hand and unblackened: these are new folios replacing those damaged, found as U7. f114-f122 should more properly be treated as an independent unit.
1 folio = guard leaf. Inserted between f239 and f240 of U3. Blank recto verso. 395 x 30 mm.
2 folios = Tirukkuṟaḷ: Table of Contents. No foliation or lost foliation. f2v blank. 395 x 30 mm.
1 bifolio = guard leaf. Blank recto verso. Recto much darker = original outside page. 395 x 30 mm.

7 folios = orphan folios. Folios of the original manuscript, replaced by new folios, as they were damaged. First 3 folios with right edges truncated are foliated 114-116. Foliation lost for last 4 folios (left and right edges truncated).
1 folio = Table of Contents of part 1 (Aṟattuppāl, named here Tuṟavaṟam) = BnF Indien 48. Foliation lost in margin truncation, if any.
1 bifolio = guard leaf. Blank recto verso. Recto much darker = original outside page. 395 x 30 mm.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation despite boreholes and truncations.

handNote.desc: Hand #2. U3, f114-f122 are by another hand and unblackened. Traditional script with modern ṟa. Unblackened.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 49 (front cover, recto).
BnF donation sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark sticker (Société Asiatique?), written in black ink: 685 (f[1]r).
Left-marginal chapter intertitles. See selection below.

This manuscript contains 2 tables of contents:
List of chapters (entitled poruṭpāl; 5 + 4 + 2 columns): chapter's name followed by its folio number; total chapters (atikāram), total sections (iyal), overall total stanzas (kuṟaḷ) (U5).
List of chapters (most probably entitled āṟattuppāl; 3 columns at least): chapter's name followed by its folio number; total chapters (atikāram), overall total stanzas (kuṟaḷ) (U8). ― This is the table of contents of part 1 (Aṟattuppāl) = BnF Indien 48.
See details below.

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF. 395 x 30 mm.

origin.origDate: No internal date. But part 3 has a date. Dated to circa 1830 by Vinson (1868) and to 1830 by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Tirukkuṟaḷ. 1961. Tiruvaḷḷuva Nāyaṉār tiruvāymalarntaruḷiya Tirukkuraḷ mūlamum paḻaiya uraiyum. Mukavurai: Mu. Varatarācaṉār. Ceṉṉai: U. Vē. Cāminātaiyar Nūl Nilaiyam.

Tirukkuṟaḷ. 1972-1976. Tirukuṟaḷ mūlamum Parimēlaḻakaruraiyum. Edited by Kō. Vaṭivēlu Ceṭṭiyār. iyaṟṟiya teḷiporuḷ viḷakkamum, karutturaiyum, kuṟippuraiyum. āṅkila moḻipeyarppuṭaṉ Tiruvaḷḷuvamālai. 3 vols.: mutal pakuti aṟattuppāl; iraṇṭām pakuti poruṭpāl; mūṉṟām pakuti kāmattuppāl. Maturai: Maturaip Palkalaik Kaḻakam.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 11, nos. 48-50.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 17r, nos. 48-50.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 17, nos. 48-50. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Encoded, revised and enlarged by Emmanuel FRANCIS.
Updated by Emmanuel FRANCIS after examination of the original manuscript. Version 2, October 2022.

body.ab:
yayalvēntarōṭu ceyaṟpāla tivaiyaṉṟit tāṉ meliyaṉāy vait tavarōṭu pakaikoṇṭāṉuk korupoḻutu nilaiyiṉmaiyiṉ viraintu keṭu me
rivai yiraṇṭu pāṭṭāṉun taṉvaliyaṟiyā vaḻippaṭu miḻukkuk kūṟappaṭṭatu ~ 4 =
pīlipey cākāṭu macciṟu mappaṇṭañ
cāla mikuttup peyiṉ = Etu = pīli yēṟṟiya cakaṭamu mac
muṟiyu mappīliyai yatu poṟukkumaḷavaṉṟi mikuttēṟṟu māyiṉeṉṟa vāṟu ~ Ummai cākāṭatu valicciṟappēyaṉṟip pīliyatu noymaicciṟappun tōṉṟaniṉṟa ta
ṟumeṉṉuñ ciṉaiviṉaimutaṉ mēṉiṉṟateḷiyareṉṟu palaroṭu pakaikoḷvāṉ ṟāṉ valiyaṉē yāyiṉu mavartokkavaḻi valiyavaḻiyumeṉṟum poruṭṭōṉ
ṟa niṉṟamai yiṉitu piṟitu moḻitaleṉṉu malaṅkāra mitaṉai nuvalāṉuvaṟciyeṉpāruñaṭṭeṉpāru muḷara roruvar palaroṭu pakaikkoḷiṟkaveṉ
ṟamaiyi ṉitaṉāṉ māṟṟāṉ valiyu mavaṉṟuṇai valiyu maṟiyāvaḻippaṭu miḻukkuk kūṟappaṭṭatu = 5 =
